about_the_game:
This is a decent game.

Play as demon king, buy various monsters, traps, and buildings, build mazes and dungeons, and block heroes!

Play as hero, purchase weapons and props, recruit teammates, conquer the demon king's dungeon, defeat the boss, and make them as teammates!

You can play alone, or play as a demon king and a hero with friends(on one computer),enjoy this new type of game!

Game elements:

■When playing the role of a demon king, enter the construction mode to purchase various monsters, traps, buildings, etc., and build your own dungeon maze to block the hero's attack!

■When playing as a hero, enter RPG mode to purchase props, weapons and armor, learn skills, recruit teammates, and explore deep dungeons and mazes!

■Multiple NPC teammates available for recruitment, as well as corresponding story lines!

■A multi-layered maze dungeon with unique features, utilizing monsters and traps to plan and construct, and fully utilizing props and skills to conquer the dungeon!

Thank you for your visit!:)

name: 我就是建-I just build Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
